column4: HEY GUYS, why is my CPU on 90 % each 5 seconds, is this normal ?
some process is going berzerk - try top or htop
i found it, its apt-index watcher, can i disabled it ?
I'd leave that alone for the time being
you mean, i shouldnt disable apt-index watcher ?
smbs to connect to shares on windows servers, samba for windows clients to access an ubuntu server
okay thank you
but i have no windows Network folder in Network CLients
yes use fstab, see man smbmount for passing options
do you want netbios support? then you need nmbd
whatis netbios for ?
it's what windows uses to match pc names to ips
not necessary if you use dns or use ips
i have dns
well you don't need to see the windows network, you just need to be able to connect to a share
also samba.org
sudo modprobe ?
yes i did sudo ,...
i am not thaqt stupid
try 'sudo modprobe sndihda_intel'
